author: aconway
msg: Add missing call to Message::setTimestamp in ManagementAgent::sendBufferLH.
Without this, messages generated here will not be expired consistently
in a cluster which may cause a broker to become inconsistent and exit

author: aconway
msg: Enable cluster-safe assertions on transition to CATCHUP
Delaying until READY was causing multiple clientConnect management
events to be raised, because broker::Connection::setUserId relies on
sys::isCluster to avoid producing duplicate events with

author: boisvert
msg: Add Gemfile for use with bundler

author: boisvert
msg: BUILDR-125 Add support for <security-role> in application.xml of EAR packaging (Mikael Amborn)

author: dblevins
msg: Put assembly in the main set of modules.
